verses.verse: (PSALM 111) (The LORD Praised for His Goodness.) (Or Hallelujah! I will) Praise (Heb Yah) the LORD! I will give thanks to the LORD with all my heart, In the company of the upright and in the assembly.
Great are the works of the LORD; They are (Lit sought out) studied by all who delight in them.
(Lit Splendor and majesty) Splendid and majestic is His work, And His righteousness endures forever.
He has caused His (I. e., wonderful acts) wonders (Lit a memorial) to be remembered; The LORD is gracious and compassionate.
He has given (Lit prey) food to those who (Or revere) fear Him; He will remember His covenant forever.
He has made known to His people the power of His works, In giving them the inheritance of the nations.
The works of His hands are (Or faithfulness) truth and justice; All His precepts are trustworthy.
They are upheld forever and ever; They are performed in (Or faithfulness) truth and uprightness.
He has sent redemption to His people; He has (Lit commanded) ordained His covenant forever; Holy and (I. e., inspiring reverence) awesome is His name.
The (Or reverence for) fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom; All those who (Lit do them) follow His commandments have a good understanding; His praise endures forever.
